definition: (literary) to be a good match
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to carve/carved words/to agree/a contract/a deed

sentences.chinese: 我们完全心灵相契，是知音。

sentences.english: Are you waiting to find the right place?
sentences.chinese: 你在等待寻得与你相契的所在吗？

sentences.english: And believe that I am the one.
sentences.chinese: 相信我就是与你心灵相契的那个人。
